name: Real Airport Truck Simulator
description:
Real airport truck duty simulator 3D is the airport ground services staff game. Play as an airport services provider and get entertained with multiple challenging airport truck duties. This 3D game offers you multiple game play scenarios. Play the role of an airplane pushing back car driver, oil tanker driver, and firefighter and follow me car driver. Perform your duties efficiently to get promoted to next missions.

Game Play Task:

-          Drag the airplane and take it to runway for flight.
-          Drive the oil tanker to the airplane and refuel the plane.
-          Drive the follow me car to help the plane to land on the runway.
-          In emergency scenario drive the firefighter truck to save lives and extinguish the fire.
-          Pick up the passengers on airport bus and drop them to their destination.

Real airport truck duty simulator 3D offers 10 levels of extreme airport duty with multiple challenging and unique tasks. This simulation game will boost up your gaming experience through realistic 3D graphics and a bundle of challenging activities.
